long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Getting tired of traditional adblockers being clunky and susceptible to YT's detection methods? Try Skip Fast for a smooth viewing experience without any video ads!

When an ad appears before or during your video, Skip Fast automatically detects it, speeds it up and clicks on the Skip button for you! Additionally, you can click on the extension icon and view the number of ads skipped since installation :)

Please leave a rating/review if this helps you out!
